flawed_nl_solution:
Each book has 8000 words because 100 x 80 = <<100*80=8000>>8000
She can finish each book in 200 minutes because 8000 / 40 = <<8000/40=200>>200
She will be reading for 12000 minutes because 20 x 60 = <<20*60=12000>>12000
She needs to check out 60 books because 12000 / 200 = <<60=60>>60
#### 60

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 1200, not 12000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
